In my free time, I enjoy creating art- mostly digital drawings, ink drawings, and watercolors. 

I love making art for logos, email signatures, and other uses! Shoot me an [email](contact.html) if you'd like to talk about this. You can also get prints of many of my pieces on my [Society6 page](https://society6.com/certainslantsoflight/all).
